text: "The Greatest" is a 2016 song by Australian singer-songwriter Sia and is the third single from her seventh studio album This Is Acting. The song features a new part with the American rapper Kendrick Lamar. It topped the single charts in Belgium, Mexico and Switzerland. It went to the top ten in Australia, Austria, Canada, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Lebanon, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, South Korea, Spain, Sweden and the United Kingdom and missed the top 10 in the United States. It is an electropop song. The song was nominated for a MTV Video Music Award in 2017. The music video features American dancer Maddie Ziegler together with 48 other young people. Category:2016 songs Category:Sia songs Category:Kendrick Lamar songs Category:Electropop songs
title: The Greatest (Sia song)
